title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for downloading, running, and managing GGUF models locally with a simple REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama as a local LLM backend for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) with multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama REST API with async and streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI with conversation history, prompt templates, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and persistent storage.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, multi-modal, function-calling, and edge deployment patterns.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images with CUDA and ROCm variants plus docker-compose stacks for CPU/GPU.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that exposes an OpenAI-compatible chat/completions endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate with Tokio support for chat, generate, pull, and embedding APIs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and both synchronous and async streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds a /ollama chat command and DM support with configurable model per channel.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI-assisted writing, summarization, and knowledge-base Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG starter using Ollama for generation and embeddings with Chroma vector store and LangChain.
